name: Event

fields.name: action
fields.description: Specifies the action being taken on the resource for an Entity event. For example, a Login IP resource for an Entity event could have an action of create. The action attribute is not used by any other event type.

fields.name: data
fields.description: Contains data used by actions. For example, data for a login event includes the login history ID. Returns a map whose keys are the type of event data, like SourceIp.

fields.name: entityId
fields.description: The ID of any entity associated with the event. For example, the entityId of a DataExport event for an Account object contains the Account ID.

fields.name: entityName
fields.description: The name of the object the event acts on.

fields.name: organizationId
fields.description: The ID of the Salesforce org where the event occurred.

fields.name: resourceType
fields.description: The type of resource for the event. For example, an AccessResource event could have a Connected Application as a resource type. Not all event types have resources.

constructors.name: Event
constructors.description: Creates an instance of the TxnSecurity.Event class.

description: Contains event information that the evaluate method uses to evaluate a transaction security policy.
